During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapon [[Freedom-Sworn]] (Sword) and the 5-star weapon [[Skyward Atlas]] (Catalyst) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

During the event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapons [[The Alley Flash]] (Sword), [[Wine and Song]] (Catalyst), [[Alley Hunter]] (Bow), as well as the 4-star weapons [[Favonius Greatsword]] (Claymore) and [[Dragon's Bane]] (Polearm) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish [[Wanderlust Invocation]].

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
